name: "The Long Goodbye" Online Trivia | 'West Wing' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who says, "They're waiting for me with sadistic anticipatory glee."
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh muttered it after he thanked CJ for finding someone else to do the press briefing.

questions.text: Who handled the press briefing for CJ?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Toby told her he would do it, but he was just as bad as Josh.

Tal.

	Talmadge "Tal" Cregg is played by Donald Moffat.

Alzheimers.

	CJ's second stepmother tells her the nickname for the disease is the long goodbye.

questions.text: What is the name of Tal's third wife?
questions.explanation:
Molly.

	Molly left Tal because of the disease.

horoligist.

	Marco Arlen (Matthew Modine) repairs watches.

questions.text: What was the name of CJ's speech?
questions.explanation:
"The Promise of a Generation".

	CJ started her speech but Toby called her and she had to go back to Washington before she could finish it.

questions.text: Did Molly come back to Tal?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	She showed up at CJ's high school reunion with Tal and they rode along with CJ to the airport.

questions.text: CJ calls Toby a pretty girl.
questions.explanation:
true.

	CJ(on the phone to Toby): "No, I didn't mean I thought you had no social skills, Toby. I'm sorry if you thought I was being insensitive to your --- I think you're --- you're a very pretty girl."

questions.text: Why did CJ have to return to Washington before finishing her speech?
options: Danny asked her to come back
questions.explanation:
there was a bombing.

	Toby called her in the middle of her speech and told her there was a bombing and that she had to come back to take over the press briefing.
